title: Jest Task configuration
description: Defines Jest task configuration. Same definitions as Jest CLI has.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

ci.description: Indicate whether the test is running in a CI environment. Tests fail in CI environment if snapshots get updated while update snapshots in non-CI environments.

configFilePath.description: The path to a jest config file relative to root project folder

coverage.description: Indicates that test coverage information should be collected and reported in the output

maxWorkers.description: Specifies the maximum number of workers the worker-pool will spawn for running tests. Default is set to 1.

runInBand.description: Run all tests serially in the current process, rather than creating a worker pool of child processes that run tests.

updateSnapshot.description: Use this flag to re-record every snapshot that fails during this test run
